Data: Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on off stump, Dravid comes well forward and defends
Clarke to Dravid, 1 run flatter one, spinning down leg stump, turned to short fine leg
Clarke to Tendulkar, 2 runs tossed up well down leg stump, Tendulkar gets down to paddle it away, Gilchrist and Clarke let out an elongated appeal but the umpire just walks away
Clarke to Tendulkar, no run thats a quicker one, the arm ball, going on from a short length but Tendulkar pushes off the back foot to point
Clarke to Tendulkar, 1 run tossed up on a short length again, and Tendulkar pushes into the gap at cover-point off the back foot
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on a length and Dravid defends off the front foot to end the session
Lee to Tendulkar, no run short ball first-up, pitching outside leg stump and getting Tendulkar ducking
Lee to Tendulkar, no run thats very, very full and wide outside off stump and Tendulkar watches it go
Lee to Tendulkar, 2 runs edged and it doesn't carry! Tendulkar pushes forward and gets a thick outside edge that bounces well in front of Ponting at second slip and runs wide of first slip
Lee to Tendulkar, no run short of a length outside off stump and he lets it be this time
Lee to Tendulkar, no run good length that, pitching just outside off and seaming away, Tendulkar is confident of where his stumps are and shoulders arms to it
Lee to Tendulkar, no run a rare full toss, on middle and leg, surprises him but he rolls the wrists nicely, tucking it to Rogers at midwicket
Clark to Dravid, FOUR runs thats a boundary, as Dravid pokes at it and edges along the ground smack in the gap at gully and slip
Clark to Dravid, 3 runs thats better, as he times his front-foot drive into the gap at cover for a triple
Clark to Tendulkar, no run straight and full and he whips that from middle and off to midwicket
Clark to Tendulkar, 2 runs errs in length and Tendulkar pushes the short ball into the gap at cover and collects two as sweeper runs around to field at deep cover
Clark to Tendulkar, no run overpitched, he drives comfortably to extra cover, where Symonds dives
Clark to Tendulkar, no run now he goes chasing a very wide one from the crease and misses
Lee to Dravid, no run short of a length outside off, Dravid goes after it and defends to point
Lee to Dravid, no run and thats a jaffa, hitting a length and swinging very late, beating a committed Dravid as he pushes off the front foot
Lee to Dravid, no run hits a good length and swings away as Dravid shoulders arms
Lee to Dravid, no run thats a crafty slower ball, 111.3ks, full outside off and stopping on Dravid, who leans forward and pushes to cover
Lee to Dravid, no run good short ball to follow up, 144ks, and Dravid quickly sways back
Lee to Dravid, no run good forward push to a good-length delivery, Dravid firm on that occasion
Clark to Tendulkar, no run back of a good length, off stump, Tendulkar defends off the front foot and the ball runs wide of gully, after which Dravid wants one but wisely gets sent back
Clark to Tendulkar, FOUR runs leans into a fullish delivery and pings the small space at extra cover, shot
Clark to Tendulkar, no run short of a length on off stump, he gets tall and keeps it down
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run full on middle and leg, he whips it away to deep backward square leg
Clark to Dravid, no run slower ball, 125.8ks, good length, Dravid leans forward and defends
Clark to Dravid, no run back of a length outside off stump and Dravid shoulders arms
Lee to Tendulkar, no run full on middle and off, he on-drives but cant beat midwicket
Lee to Tendulkar, no run good sharp one, fizzing back in off a length and sniffing past Tendulkar's grill as he quickly drops back on the haunches, arching his back well
Lee to Tendulkar, no run short of a length outside off, he hops back and drives streakily off the back foot to a diving Hussey at backward point, well stopped there
Lee to Tendulkar, 2 runs angles in off a short length, he turns it into the gap at square leg for two
Lee to Tendulkar, no run irritably crunches a short one into the covers, where Rogers flings himself around excellently and saves certain runs, top effort that
Lee to Tendulkar, no run quick, short of a length ball outside off stump, Tendulkar leaves it be
Clark to Dravid, no run short of a length outside off stump, he gets up and leaves it alone
Clark to Dravid, 1 run short of a length on leg stump, Dravid turns it wide of short fine leg
Clark to Tendulkar, no run and he entices him with a good-length, wide delivery going away, but Tendulkar chooses not to have a go
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 wide thats again full and wide, outside off, and he lets it go to Gilchrist
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run good length outside off stump, he gets tall and steers it wide of point
Clark to Dravid, no run good full ball, moving in late through the air, almost up there in the block hole and Dravid digs it back out to the bowler
Clark to Dravid, no run good length on off stump, he kneels down but mistimes his drive back to Clark

Lee to Tendulkar, no run short of a length on leg stump, Tendulkar shapes to flick but the ball clips him very, very high on the knee roll and Lee belts and continues to belt out an appeal but that wasn't out, show replays, as it was carrying on over the stumps
Lee to Tendulkar, no run gets a short one and arches back to play the uppercut but this time he misses
Lee to Tendulkar, no run good length just outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives to cover

Lee to Tendulkar, OUT this time Lee gets his man, he pitches short of a length and gets Tendulkar back in the crease, playing down the wrong line, the ball hit him on the top of the pad and at the time of contact Tendulkar was jumping in the air, Lee appeals confidently and umpire Rauf eventually raises the finger ... replays show it was indeed
Lee to Ganguly, no run welcomed with a sharp bouncer, he ducks low as it sails over
Lee to Ganguly, 1 leg bye short and outside leg stump, he shapes to nudge but doesn't make contact and the ball runs fine
Clark to Ganguly, no run short of a length, angling across him and he just pulls out of the shot
Clark to Ganguly, 4 leg byes short and down leg side, he plays it off the pads down to fine leg
Clark to Ganguly, no run short into the ribs, Ganguly hops up awkwardly and plays into the ground
Clark to Ganguly, FOUR runs good length delivery, pitches outside off and comes in but he counters the movement with a full face of the bat, pushing past mid-off for four, good shot
Clark to Ganguly, 1 run fuller this time, slower ball, 129ks, looking for movement, and Ganguly gets a thick inside-edge past leg stump after he chases the ball
Clark to Dravid, 1 run short on middle and leg, Dravid rides the lift and drops it nicely in front of square leg, getting tall and using the wrists
Lee to Dravid, no run lifting outside off stump, Dravid gets onto the toes and drops it in front of gully
Lee to Dravid, no run again he's offered with but cant beat Clarke at point, cutting into the ground
Lee to Dravid, (no ball) early into the shot, coming onto the front foot and defending towards gully
Lee to Dravid, no run back of a good length outside off, he shuffles forward and pushes to point
Lee to Dravid, no run 135.8ks, good, tight delivery gets Dravid coming forward in defence
Lee to Dravid, no run short and rising, but he gets very tall and drops it down at his feet
Lee to Dravid, no run good length, forcing Dravid to really reach forward and defend to point
Johnson to Ganguly, no run short of a length on off stump, Ganguly gets in line and defends to point
Johnson to Ganguly, FOUR runs cheeky and effective, Ganguly getting airborne to a short and rising delivery well outside off stump and steering over slips and gully for a one-bounce four
Johnson to Ganguly, no run predictably, very full and a touch slower and Ganguly drives to cover
Johnson to Ganguly, no run good length again, forcing him into a watchful defensive shot to cover

Johnson to Ganguly, OUT oh good catch, Hussey! Ganguly stands his ground and flirts with a wide delivery, and Hussey dives to his right and intercepts a very good catch in the air at backward point to get rid of him, terrific reflexes
Johnson to Laxman, 1 run full ball on off stump, Laxman gets down quickly and keeps it out to cover
Tait to Laxman, FOUR runs short and a touch wide, and Laxman chases it with a steer between gully and point, good shot but risky
Tait to Laxman, no run short of a length on off stump, he gets tall and drops it at his feet
Tait to Laxman, no run back of a length, getting Laxman back in his crease, defending to point
Tait to Laxman, no run good full ball, 140ks, almost a yorker outside leg and he jams it out
Tait to Laxman, no run beaten, as Tait changes holds back the length and gets this one to leave Laxman, who stands his ground and feels for it outside off stump, good ball
Tait to Laxman, 2 runs full and on the pads, clipped through backward square for a brace
Johnson to Dravid, no run good length outside off stump, Dravid comes forward and defends to cover
Johnson to Dravid, no run full and very wide, Dravid chases it and makes a mess, chopping into the ground in front of Clarke at point
Johnson to Dravid, 1 run short outside leg stump, gets Dravid hopping and turning it wide of square leg
Johnson to Laxman, FOUR runs up and over Hussey at gully, as Laxman is sucked into a loose drive away from his body and survives as the ball didn't go to hand!
Johnson to Laxman, 2 runs strays down leg stump and Laxman flicks off the pads with ease
Johnson to Laxman, no run good stuff, pitching on a good length and drawing another faulty push away from the body, Laxman beaten on that occasion
Tait to Dravid, no run hits a good length well outside off, Dravid pushes to Symonds at cover
Tait to Dravid, 1 run straighter one and he dangerously shuffles across, flicking to midwicket
Tait to Laxman, no run there's the outswinger, pitching back of a length and beating Laxman as he prods and pokes outside off stump and gets beaten again
Tait to Laxman, no run back of a length outside off and thats a confident leave off the front foot
Tait to Laxman, no run bouncer outside off stump, and he sways out of the way
Tait to Laxman, no run short of a length on off stump, he gets across in a flash and defends nicelt
Johnson to Dravid, no run good length on the stumps, Dravid walks into a forward defensive
Johnson to Dravid, FOUR runs freebie, down the pads and he gets a touch on it to help the ball to fine leg
Johnson to Dravid, no run good length outside off stump, he walks forward and defends to cover

Johnson to Dravid, no run thats a good shout! Johnson nails a good yorker on off stump and Dravid fails to bring the toe end of the bat down in time, the ball hits boot first and its very tough to judge that one, the ball may have carried on past off stump ... replays are inconclusive as well ... a very good ball from Johnson
Johnson to Dravid, FOUR runs a touch wide of off stump, Dravid gets back and cuts wide of gully
Johnson to Dravid, no run good length on off stump, he gets in line and defends watchfully
Tait to Laxman, no run short of a length on middle and leg, Laxman stands tall and defends
Tait to Laxman, 3 runs short of a length outside off, he slashes hard and threads the gap at point, Hussey gives chase and hauls it in with good effort
Tait to Dravid, FOUR runs a gift, full and very wide and its slashed through gully and point for four
Tait to Dravid, (no ball) oversteps, pitches full on middle and off and Dravid drives to mid-on
Tait to Dravid, no run short of a length on off stump, he gets back and defends
Tait to Dravid, no run this one's fuller and he stretches well forward to defend
Tait to Dravid, no run good length outside off and he defends to cover
Johnson to Laxman, no run back of a length on leg, squares him up, Laxman nearly chops it onto the stumps
Johnson to Laxman, no run bowls this one wide outside off, gets it to move away, left alone
Johnson to Laxman, no run hits a good length outside off, Laxman turns his wrists and tucks it to square leg
Johnson to Laxman, FOUR runs wide outside off and moving away, Laxman stretches out, stays on the back foot and glides it off an open face past gully and down to third man
Johnson to Laxman, no run fuller in length outside off, pushed towards gully
Johnson to Laxman, no run full and wide outside the off stump, Laxman gets his bat down and softly pushes to mid-off
Tait to Dravid, no run slides down the leg side, Dravid tries to glance it fine but doesn't make contact
Tait to Dravid, no run poor ball and not such a good shot, full and wide outside off, swinging away, Dravid stretches out and nearly gets an edge
Tait to Dravid, no run holds the length back, he manages exagerrated away movement again and Dravid opts the play safe by shouldering arms
Tait to Dravid, 1 run short and wide outside off, Dravid frees his arms and cuts, deep point cuts it off
Tait to Laxman, no run shorter outside off and wide as well, Laxman cuts firmly along the ground but finds point
Tait to Laxman, no run full and swinging in, Tait searches for that yorker, Laxman pushes it to mid-off
Johnson to Dravid, no run tempts him with width outside off, Dravid opens the face and glides it to gully on the first bounce
Johnson to Dravid, no run good length outside the off stump, pushed to the off side
Johnson to Dravid, no run full outside the off stump, in the slot to drive, Dravid pushes it firmly to the covers, that was a good stroke but the placement wasn't right
Johnson to Dravid, 1 wide bangs it in short outside leg, goes through quite quickly to Gilchrist as Dravid sways away

Johnson to Dravid, no run poor calling.... Dravid tucks it with soft hands to the on side, laxman sets off, Dravid sends him back, Johnson collects the ball isn't quick enough with the throw as Laxman makes his ground
Johnson to Dravid, 2 runs fuller and swinging in, Dravid tucks it down to fine leg and sets off
Johnson to Dravid, no run
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up outside off stump, Laxman comes forward and drives to cover
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket
Symonds to Laxman, no run flatter one outside off, he gets forward and plays it away
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up on a length, he doesn't time his forward defensive too well
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up on middle and off, awkwardly defended
Symonds to Laxman, no run drifts onto middle and leg, he works it straight to midwicket
Clarke to Dravid, 2 runs flat on middle and leg, he gets back and pushes to Jaques at mid-on
Clarke to Dravid, no run speared down leg stump, he tucks it around the corner past short fine leg
Clarke to Dravid, no run thats a loose one, full toss way outside off but he drives straight to cover
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up wide, he shapes to play but takes it on the pad, just outside the line of impact
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up flat on middle and off, Dravid pushes to cover
Clarke to Dravid, 1 run short and wide and he rocks back to cut past point
Symonds to Dravid, no run flat, spinning back into him and he mistimes the back-foot cut to Symonds
Symonds to Dravid, 1 run flat down leg stump, he plays in front of the front pad to square leg
Symonds to Laxman, no run 85ks, full and flat on off stump and he drives back to Symonds, who dives to his right and does well to save runs
Symonds to Laxman, no run short on middle and off, Laxman gets back and works it to midwicket
Symonds to Laxman, 1 run thats short and wide and he cuts it past backward point
Symonds to Dravid, no run tossed up on leg stump, Dravid patiently defends to leg
Clarke to Laxman, 1 run very full and flat on leg stump, easily turned past square leg
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on off stump, good loop, Dravid greets it with a drive to extra cover
Clarke to Dravid, no run lands on off and spins away, he backs away too and cuts to point
Clarke to Dravid, no run again its just too short and Dravid cuts to backward point
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on a length, now he gets forward and pats it back to Clarke
Clarke to Dravid, no run drifts into middle and off and Dravid smothers the spin, getting forward
Symonds to Laxman, no run flat outside off, comes in and he punches into the covers
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up on a length, gets Laxman back in his crease, defending
Symonds to Laxman, 1 run short one and Laxman pulls in the air out to Hogg at deep midwicket, but the ball doesn't carry to him, landing short as he looked into the sun
Symonds to Dravid, no run tossed up on middle and off, he gets well forward and defends
Symonds to Dravid, no run flighted on leg stump, defended to the close-in fielder
Symonds to Dravid, no run short outside off, Dravid rocks back and cuts, Clark dives at point and saves runs
Clarke to Laxman, 1 run tossed up wide, inviting the drive, Laxman pushes past a diving Symonds
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on off stump, getting him forward to defend
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on middle and leg, he patiently defends to bat-pad
Clarke to Dravid, 4 leg byes this one slides down leg stump and a deft little glance, and the lighting fast outfield, carries the ball down to fine leg ... thats the 50-run stand
Clarke to Dravid, FOUR runs poor ball, short and wide and he carves it away for four past point
Clarke to Dravid, no run flighted up on middle and off, getting Dravid forward to defend watchfully
Symonds to Laxman, 1 run again, very wide and its Laxman's turn to cut out to deep point
Symonds to Dravid, no run tossed up on middle and off, Dravid comes forward and on-drives to mid-on
Symonds to Dravid, FOUR runs bang, thats four, as Dravid gets across and slogs it away, there's no cover for that in the deep, well slapped
Symonds to Dravid, no run short again, he gets back and cuts into the ground in front of gully
Symonds to Dravid, 1 run tossed up, he gets forward and back to push wide of the fielder
Symonds to Laxman, no run tossed up on middle and off, Laxman comes forward and defends
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up on a length, Dravid comes forward and defends
Clarke to Dravid, no run tossed up wide, he uses the feet and drives back to Clarke, very hard
Clarke to Dravid, no run again, Dravid reaches out and hits hard into the covers
Clarke to Dravid, no run thats flatter, on off stump, and Dravid gets back to defend
Clarke to Dravid, 1 run quick, spinning down leg stump, he tucks it wide of Hussey at short fine leg
Clarke to Laxman, no run looped up on middle and leg, Laxman sashays down and drives to extra cover
Symonds to Dravid, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he shuffles and turns into the gap behind square
Symonds to Laxman, 1 run spins down leg stump, he gets forward and turns it to short fine leg
Symonds to Dravid, no run short and flat, a hint of turn, Dravid gets tall and drives it back to Symonds
Symonds to Dravid, no run spins down leg stump, Dravid misses and Gilchrist fumbles the take
Symonds to Dravid, no run tossed up on a length, he comes well forward and defends

Symonds to Dravid, OUT now where did that atrocious shot come from? Symonds tosses it up well outside off and in an extraordinary mental block, with a hundred there for the taking, Dravid plays an ugly cross-batted swipe and top-edges to the man at cover, who just side-steps a touch and holds a dolly
Clarke to Laxman, no run tossed up on a length, Laxman comes forward and pushes to cover
Clarke to Laxman, no run spins down leg stump, Laxman misses the leg glance
Clarke to Laxman, no run flatter on middle and off, he gets over it and defends
Clarke to Laxman, no run pushed through quick again, Laxman uses his feet and drives to cover
Clarke to Laxman, no run again, good use of the feet but he cannot beat extra cover or mid-off
Clarke to Laxman, no run thats the straighter one, going on past off stump as Laxman misses it
Lee to Dhoni, no run short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni comes forward and shoulders arms
Lee to Dhoni, no run full on leg stump, he uses his feet and drives to midwicket, Clark was back at mid-on and Dhoni wanted one but Laxman sent him back
Lee to Dhoni, no run short of a length on off stump, Dhoni gets back and defends to point
Lee to Dhoni, no run thats a bouncer, sliding down leg and almost grazing Dhoni's left shoulder
Lee to Dhoni, 2 runs overpitched on leg stump, worked past square leg for a couple
Lee to Dhoni, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets across and shoulders arms
Johnson to Laxman, 1 wide short and slanting away outside off stump, Laxman gets up and then leaves
Johnson to Laxman, no run good length, nipping back off the seam and he gets bat forward in time
Johnson to Laxman, no run short of a length, decent shape back into Laxman, who checks his defence
Johnson to Laxman, no run back of a length, a touch wide, moves back in after Laxman opts to leave
Johnson to Laxman, no run full this time, as Johnson searches for swing, its driven to extra cover
Johnson to Laxman, 1 run short of a length and he gets back nicely, pushing into the covers for one
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run full outside off and Dhoni plays an expansive cover-drive with little movement of the feet
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length, sliding into leg stump, he nudges to mid-on for a risky single
Lee to Laxman, no run just short of a drivable length, Laxman comes forward and pushes to point
Lee to Laxman, no run this one's shorter and nips back into him, well turned to midwicket

Lee to Laxman, OUT and there you go! Laxman, like Dravid not too long ago, plays a poor stroke, a horrific back-foot shot to a short ball from Lee, walking back in his crease and flat-batting to mid-off, where Tait leaps up in the air and takes a simple enough catch
Lee to Pathan, (no ball) thats a nasty lifter outside off, forcing him to sway away
Lee to Pathan, FOUR runs a gift, full outside leg stump and he deflects it down to fine leg to get off the mark
Lee to Pathan, no run short of a length, angling across Pathan, who defends to point
Johnson to Dhoni, no run bangs that one in short and as it rises the batsman stays in the line on middle, swaying his head out of the way, but not the shoulder and it raps him hard
Johnson to Dhoni, no run regulation straight delivery, doesn't quite get up, in front of off and defended
Johnson to Dhoni, no run over the wicket, angles in towards middle and leg, a bit of in-drift raps him as the batsman lets it crash on to his pads
Johnson to Dhoni, no run spears that way wide of the batsman here, down off, it pitches full and is left alone
Johnson to Dhoni, no run hint of curve back in from outside off now on a good length, the batsman is a bit late on the defensive but manages to squeeze some bat down on it
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run outside off, a good length ball which is fended on the front foot with a straight bat into the covers

Lee to Dhoni, no run finds some outswing first dart, the ball curving away as it nips wide and stays comparatively low, the batsman comes forward to play a defensive on the front foot, but lets the ball past him
Lee to Dhoni, no run this one makes him play, in front of off, and it's jabbed forward defensively and tightly
Lee to Dhoni, no run good length, inviting Dhoni forward, and he shapes to play the ball which pitches just outside off and nips wider, but leaves it at the last second
Lee to Dhoni, no run a well-pitched delivery outside off, the swing beating the batsman who presses forward down the line but the ball jinks on past
Lee to Dhoni, no run more away swing and again on a good length, enough width for the batsman to stride forward and then shoulder arms to allow it through
Lee to Dhoni, no run draws him into the would-be cover drive now, but the ball bends away from the bat
Johnson to Pathan, no run left-armer to left hander, great ball first up, Pathan stabs forward down the line of off and squares up, squirting an outside edge tantalisingly toward the waiting slips
Johnson to Pathan, no run a crashing yorker on middle that's just dug out at the last millisecond by a hastened batsman
Johnson to Pathan, 1 leg bye strays on to leg this time, enough width for a relieved Pathan to work the ball off his legs and get off strike - Johnson, bowling around the 140s, is sharp out there
Johnson to Dhoni, no run up there and defended on the front foot, not much room to do much else
Johnson to Dhoni, no run angled across the right hander, nipping away on the seam, wide enough to leave

Johnson to Dhoni, no run aggression here from Dhoni, good to see, pouncing on the touch of width on offer outside off, and driving crashingly to the covers where it's sharply stopped by the big fella AKA Stuart Clark
Lee to Pathan, no run oh hello, Pathan was tempted into the drive there and, my, he was lucky not to have got the outside edge as the ball boomed past him
Lee to Pathan, no run that's beaten the outside edge again, this one tighter into the stumps
Lee to Pathan, no run pulls the bouncer out of his metaphorical locker now, and ducked under
Lee to Pathan, no run angled across him again, Lee staying over by the way, defended stoutly on the front foot
Lee to Pathan, 1 run cheeky little nibble-and-go into the covers there, Dhoni calls him through for the single and up comes the 300
Lee to Dhoni, no run lets that one go down the off-side, a rising one met with shouldered arms, and so lets Pathan stay on strike. You can't imagine Pathan's too chuffed about that
Johnson to Pathan, no run slung with no little muscle down the off-side, shortish, but wide and left
Johnson to Pathan, no run a better length, fuller, and also slightly tighter, but Pathan judges it well in leaving
Johnson to Pathan, no run slinks that one down the channel
Johnson to Pathan, no run pushed down the channel, and Pathan leaves it very easily

Johnson to Pathan, no run ...but not this time, a miscue outside off, playing a short one away from his body with a scold-worthily lack of footwork which nearly undoes him, but the ball goes safe in front of him
Johnson to Pathan, no run similar kind of delivery, if tighter, and Pathan is able to defend more sturdily this time
Lee to Dhoni, no run wheels a straightforward delivery down the channel, a regulation leave, but you can see what Lee is trying to do: draw the batsman into playing outside off
Lee to Dhoni, no run ...and he finds the edge this time, a decent ball just outside off, pushed fuller and an edge goes down to the gully
Lee to Dhoni, no run lets this one through this time, Lee continuing to plumb the channel
Lee to Dhoni, no run in the corridor line this time, but it's short, and the bouncer is swayed way away from, and pretty easily, too
Lee to Dhoni, no run maintains a good line, the ball plinking down the channel once more, on a good length and left alone
Lee to Dhoni, no run guess where he bowled it? Correct, and it took some swing away, Dhoni not tempted into flashing outside off
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run Pathan decides enough is enough and aims to squeeze a ball on off through midwicket
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run but Dhoni is more confident, the ball shortish on middle, and he presses down off the hips for an easy clip-and-run
Johnson to Pathan, 3 runs and a better shot from Pathan too, taking one from off and working out in front of midwicket. Some good running from the batsmen, there
Johnson to Dhoni, no run stays over to the right hander, good length ball on off, defended forward
Johnson to Dhoni, no run slower delivery, 138.9kph, drops down in front of off, almost yorker length, and it's tidily defended
Lee to Pathan, FOUR runs over the wicket, overstretched with a half-volley that Pathan stands tall to meet, presenting the face of the bat and the ball races through mid-off
Lee to Pathan, no run up there again, but tighter, and defended on the front foot now
Lee to Pathan, no run strained across the left hander on a good length, wide enough to leave
Lee to Pathan, no run angles into the left hander now, pushed back forward on the front foot towards Lee who scoops it up
Lee to Pathan, no run banged in at the left hander, moving in off the seam and that was comfortably ducked under, on the knees
Lee to Pathan, no run similar ball, similar result, only this time Pathan practises his on-on- knee-and-sway manoeuvre. This is also effective
Johnson to Dhoni, no run oh hello, not much daylight offered on that one, right up there on off and forcing the defensive
Johnson to Dhoni, 2 runs half-volley on off, not quite timed, but they pick up something all the same from a front-foot push
Johnson to Dhoni, no run moved back in from the seam from outside off, cutting right back and rapping his bat above the sticks, the ball crashing back into his body
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs a stand-and-deliver shot from Dhoni, literally, he took one step, stopped and then swung his arms away from his body through the covers. Belted
Johnson to Dhoni, no run Johnson responds well with a better-length delivery that rears up outside off, forcing Dhoni to shoulder arms once on his haunches

Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run outside off once more, Dhoni stands firm and tries to repeat a similar shot from two balls back, only straighter. He plays it a fraction late and the ball crashes off the toe of the bat into the floor and hardly goes anywhere
Lee to Dhoni, no run a little bit of movement away from the right hander outside off, he jumps back and shoulders arms
Lee to Dhoni, no run a slow, slower ball, at 113kph, the ball also dying, oddly, on its way through outside off
Lee to Dhoni, 2 runs reaches outside off to scoop the ball round through midwicket
Lee to Dhoni, no run tight delivery outside off, a good length, and it's wisely left alone
Lee to Dhoni, no run short ball, rising over off, in other words a bouncer, swayed under, reverse-limbo-style
Lee to Dhoni, no run done him like a kipper, or a dressed lamb, anyway the ball nipped back in from outside off, on a good length, and though he shaped to leave it, it nearly brushed the outside edge
Johnson to Pathan, no run stays over, obviously enough as he's facing a left hander, up there on off, and snuffed out defensively on the front foot
Johnson to Pathan, no run hurried on to him down the same line, the ball jumping up and defended back down on the back foot
Johnson to Pathan, FOUR runs strays on to middle with the attempted yorker that's in fact a half-volley, Pathan waiting for the one which angled back in to him and flicked it in front of midwicket
Johnson to Pathan, FOUR runs overcorrects with a wide one, Pathan crashes out a cut through the gully that flies in the air but Superman Hussey can't stay airborne long enough as he dives to the left
Johnson to Pathan, no run defended this time
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run turned well off the legs through fine leg to round off a useful over for India
Clark to Pathan, no run start-and-a-half from Clark who licks the ball away from the left hander, movement from both the seam and in the air, too good for the batsman who's saved by the drift away
Clark to Pathan, no run lets that one go through down off, more deliberate this time, the ball again nipping off the seam away

Clark to Pathan, 1 run overpitches this time, at 131.7kph on off, pushed out through the covers where there's some neat work with a forward dive to take the pace off the ball, if not quite a full stop

Clark to Dhoni, OUT pitches in line with off, there's a huge, long appeal and Umpire Rauf takes his time to give that one out. Dhoni gets in a big stride forward on a bouncy pitch, the ball hits him on the knee roll, the batsman not quite bending his knee on the forward defensive

Clark to Kumble, no run got him! Hasn't got him! Kumble comes on to his front foot and squirted out towards Jaques at short midwicket who dives forward but didn't catch it cleanly and immediately signals so
Clark to Kumble, no run a much less eventful ball to round off the over, defending forward in line with off
Johnson to Dhoni, no run oh thats close, as Dhoni opts to shoulder arms to one that narrowly misses clipping the top of off stump
Johnson to Dhoni, no run fuller, looking for swing, Dhoni comes forward and defends to cover
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs there's his first boundary, reaching out to a wide one and driving past cover
Johnson to Dhoni, no run short of a length outside off, he gets across and leaves it be
Johnson to Dhoni, no run 138.6ks, back of a length, Dhoni inches forward and defends
Johnson to Dhoni, no run short of a length outside off, angling away, 138ks, well left
Lee to Pathan, 2 runs ah thats tough! Lee bangs in a snorter, Pathan tries to get out of the way but bat hangs out in the air and the thick edge flies just over third slip
Lee to Pathan, no run short of a length outside off stump, he gets back and shoulders arms
Lee to Pathan, no run jaffa! A cracking bouncer has him sniffing leather, but he just does well to rear his head out of the way - what a delivery at the end of the day
Lee to Pathan, 2 runs fuller one now, swinging in, Pathan pushes wide of mid-on and wants two
Lee to Pathan, no run sharp one, nipping back off a short length, 146ks, and Pathan lunges forward then back to defend towards point
Lee to Pathan, no run beaten, as Pathan pushes off the front foot but cannot connect
Johnson to Pathan, no run right up there and defended forward
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run presses forward to clip into midwicket on the front foot, the ball a regulation one on off
Johnson to Kumble, no run cracker from Johnson, evil movement in the air and pitches just outside off, nearly clipping the batsman's outside edge, a nervy one for Kumble
Johnson to Kumble, no run pushed a bit wider, fended away from the body on the front foot into the covers
Johnson to Kumble, 1 run a drop at gully, Clark diving to his left, as Kumble lashed a back-foot cut hard down from a wideish delivery
Johnson to Pathan, OUT another wicket, a full delivery, a dipping low toss rapping him on the front shin in front of leg, and a smiling Johnson roars his appeal, knowing what the answer will be

Clark to Kumble, OUT top catch from Rogers, diving full length to his right in the covers, as Kumble, repeating his lashing efforts for the previous over, drives on the up, his shoulders pointing upwards so he wasn't over the ball, and Rogers snaps it up with a classic catch
Clark to Sharma, no run he survives a huge appeal first up for a strangle down leg, Gilchrist diving well to his left, but it's turned down, rightly as it turns out, as the ball brushed hip only
Clark to Sharma, no run stands tall, defends down on the back foot just outside off
Clark to Sharma, no run Ishant takes a few positive steps forward towards point, but quickly turns defensive as Clark gives him a straight bouncer
Clark to Sharma, no run on off, shortish, Ishant fends into the covers
Clark to Sharma, no run a booming yorker on off, well dug out by Ishant
Johnson to Singh, no run Johnson misdirects a bouncer over leg, which is crouched under

Johnson to Singh, OUT Johnson wraps up the innings by flinging down a climbing delivery which rises and catches the top of RP Singh's blade, the ricochet pouched by Hussey who stands, nearly celebrates before the ball's reached him, and was never in a month of Sundays going to drop that one

India have quickly subsided following the loss of Dhoni which is a shame as they were looking good for 400 for a few brief moments earlier on today. Instead, they're gone for 330, the last four wickets adding a further 33 today. Johnson looked pretty dangerous from the off today, and Clark did well when he came on for a quick flirt. RP Singh races off
Right, it's Jaques and Rogers batting together for the first time, RP Singh to bowl.
Singh to Jaques, 2 runs Jaques is away immediately, taking the ball from middle, letting it pitch, then pushing it easily through midwicket
Singh to Jaques, no run waits, and defends forward on the front foot
Singh to Jaques, no run gentle swing away down the off-side, the batsman letting the ball go through on a good regulation length
Singh to Jaques, no run good length, up there in front of off, defended on the front foot
Singh to Jaques, no run on off, left alone a rising delivery shortish, on its way through
Singh to Jaques, no run oh, just past him, excellent delivery from Singh, pushing him on to the back foot, squaring him up outside off and just failing to take the edge
Pathan to Rogers, no run a thick edge to start with, the ball whirring away from him, and the ball squirting to the gully
Pathan to Rogers, no run lets the ball through the channel this time, the length too good to think about playing
Pathan to Rogers, no run fuller delivery, and on off this time, curve away again, Rogers this time sends a leading edge towards the covers
Pathan to Rogers, no run comes forward and clips towards midwicket
Pathan to Rogers, no run lets this one through to the keeper, more lip-licking curl from Pathan

Pathan to Rogers, no run makes him play this time, the ball aiming towards off and with the familiar swing, Rogers defends sturdily on the front foot and he now has his first over of Test cricket under his belt.
Singh to Jaques, no run right up there in front of off, defended forward solidly
Singh to Jaques, no run a touch shorter, Jaques comes forward, looking to drive through mid-off, but stops onthe shot, opting to defend instead
Singh to Jaques, no run rising up at 141.9kph on off, the batsman jumps up to defend back down off the back foot

Singh to Jaques, 2 runs outside off, Jaques drives away from his body through the covers, his bottom hand flying up off the bat and there's hesitation about coming back for he second from Jaques, but when they decide to they make it home easily
Singh to Jaques, no run Singh bungs in a bouncer, testing the track, but it's easily left outside off
Singh to Jaques, FOUR runs width outside off, you can't bowl there to him etc, and he smashes an authoritative cut through point and on to the rope
Pathan to Rogers, FOUR runs width outside off, Rogers comes out of his crease, and nails a square drive through the covers
Pathan to Rogers, no run comes out to look to play the same shot, it's a touch fuller, so he leaves it
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run excellent whippy delivery, tight up there, and somehow Ponting manages to squeeze out to the leg side
Pathan to Hussey, no run more testing swing away from (yet another) left hander, but it's wide enough to leave
Singh to Ponting, 1 run swung on to leg, turned off the hips through fine leg
Singh to Hussey, no run outside off, swung well and rising through at head-height to Dhoni, 141kph
Singh to Hussey, no run shuffles more of the same down the channel, but Hussey isn't tempted
Singh to Hussey, no run bangs in short outside off, moving away, Hussey's eyes light up when he sees the shortness, he goes for the hook, but pulls out at the last second
Singh to Hussey, no run Singh slings down a bouncer right over the sticks, Hussey does well to duck
Singh to Hussey, no run more of the short stuff, this one just outside off, and he can leave it. So he does
Pathan to Ponting, no run low full toss on middle that Ponting plays a bit awkwardly, almost having to reach in the end to tuck it into midwicket
Pathan to Ponting, no run great delivery... to a left hander... Ponting lets it veer down leg, at a good length
Pathan to Ponting, no run a deliberate one down leg this time, tighter and Ponting is ever so close to getting some bat on it
Pathan to Ponting, no run well bowled on off this time, Ponting forced to defend late on the front foot, the edge crashing down and just missing the stumps
Pathan to Ponting, no run comes forward to defend on the front foot
Pathan to Ponting, no run down leg, Ponting leaves it alone
Singh to Hussey, no run three slips and a gully waiting for an edge that doesn't come from the drive into the covers

Singh to Clarke, FOUR runs a big appeal for lbw, but turned down as the ball pitches on middle and veers away from him late, Clarke pressing down a would-be forward defensive and the edge squirts wide of the slips
Singh to Clarke, no run swing down leg, Clarke's drawn forward, looking to do something that's not clear, and the ball races down the leg-side
Singh to Clarke, no run
Pathan to Ponting, no run comes out forward, looking to turn the ball from outside off to midwicket
Pathan to Ponting, FOUR runs width outside off, and too short as well, Ponting reaches out away from his body to play a cover drive down on one knee
Pathan to Ponting, no run tries to tempt him into an edgy cover drive again, this one just a touch straighter, and it holds its line on the way through
Pathan to Ponting, no run a play and a miss down leg this time, a good-length delivery this one
Pathan to Ponting, no run swinging down leg, Ponting comes out to try to on-drive, but is too late on the shot and it hits his pads

Pathan to Ponting, no run forced Ponting into a lunge this time, the captain reaching out at a stretch to tamely drive into the covers, the ball too wide really and he did well to control it along the ground
Singh to Clarke, 1 run starts off with one swinging down leg stump and Clarke clips to fine leg
Singh to Ponting, no run hits a length on about leg stump and Ponting defends to Jaffer, up close
Singh to Ponting, no run good length, as the ball swings away and stops on Ponting, who has to check his forward drive to short extra cover

Singh to Ponting, no run this one swings back in late from the stumps, pretty late, and thumps Ponting on the front pad as he gets a full stride in, they appeal but Bowden shakes his head, positive that the ball was too high over the stumps ... I'd like to see a replay on that
Singh to Ponting, FOUR runs thats a top shot, as he counters the swing with good use of the feet and on-drives past mid-on, the bat turning in his gloves
Singh to Ponting, no run short of a length, going away, Ponting gets across to cover off and defends
Pathan to Clarke, no run good length, movement back in, Clarke gets forward and defends
Pathan to Clarke, 2 runs thats a better shot, as he uses the feet and drives into the circle
Pathan to Clarke, no run short of a length, sits up but he plays that down well in front of midwicket
Pathan to Clarke, no run good length and shape away as Clarke plants forward and leaves
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run short of a length, moving back in, Clarke plays it late and with soft hands, dropping it in front of cover and calling for a very cool single, well run
Pathan to Ponting, no run dangerous leave, as Ponting plants pad out and shoulders arms to a good-length ball that angles across and goes not very far from off stump
Singh to Clarke, 3 runs pitches on the stumps and swing back in, allowing Clarke to shuffle across and turn it past square leg for easy runs
Singh to Ponting, no run bouncer over leg stump, and Ponting ducks under it with few hassles
Singh to Ponting, 2 runs too full on the pads and its clipped past midwicket for a couple
Singh to Ponting, 2 runs nice shot, as he gets tall and punches a short one off the back foot past cover and point, with Sehwag giving chase and keeping them to two
Singh to Ponting, no run 136ks, on a length, leg stump, and he shuffles to defend it back
Singh to Ponting, 1 run short of a length and he hops back to gently nudge past cover for one
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run 137ks, too short and Ponting pulls out to deep backward square, making sure to keep it pretty decently close to the ground
Pathan to Clarke, no run 133ks, short and wide and Clarke plays a wild slash at it, beaten as the ball curves back in
Pathan to Clarke, no run short of a length, straightening again, and he taps it to square leg as Ponting firmly yells out 'NO!' to him
Pathan to Clarke, no run short again, 132.3ks, sits up well but he also rises with the movement and plays it down at his feet
Pathan to Clarke, no run much fuller and wide, so Clarke strides forward and leaves it alone
Pathan to Clarke, no run that one pitches just outside off stump and swings back in late, coming close to off as Clarke pads forward and shoulders arms
Singh to Ponting, no run 135.2ks, good length on the stumps, he shuffles and plays it back
Singh to Ponting, no run short outside off and Ponting hurriedly pushes to mid-off off the back foot
Singh to Ponting, no run short of a length, straightening after pitching, played to point off the back foot
Singh to Ponting, 3 runs quicker one, 140ks, but the line's wrong, short and wide and Ponting gets back to push it past cover and point for three
Singh to Clarke, no run better length, fuller on middle and off and Clarke whips it to midwicket
Singh to Clarke, no run back of a length and going away, Clarke gets well forward and leaves
Pathan to Ponting, no run good length outside off, angling away from Ponting as he leaves it be
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run strays outside leg stump, Ponting tucks it off the hips to deep fine leg
Pathan to Clarke, no run back of a length but the line's wrong, pitching on leg stump, Clarke gets across and rolls the wrists nicely but he cant beat square leg
Pathan to Clarke, no run much fuller, luring Clarke into a false drive but the outside-edge doesn't quite carry to Kumble at gully ... but thats the area these two need to hit
Pathan to Clarke, no run pitches outside leg stump this time and Clarke turns to midwicket
Pathan to Clarke, no run short of a length on middle and off, he gets up and defends to midwicket
Sharma to Ponting, no run starts off with a shortish one, nice bounce, and Ponting pokes it to point
Sharma to Ponting, no run 140.7ks, a good length outside off, sucking Ponting into a poor attempt at a pull shot, missing the ball by a whisker

Sharma to Ponting, OUT and thats an immaculate length from Sharma to hand Ponting another poor score! There was movement and bounce after the ball landed in a good channel, sucking Ponting forward then back as he hangs the bat out and a regulation outside-edge is snapped up by Dravid at third slip! Australia are in trouble! That was Dravid's 16
Sharma to Symonds, 1 wide he's welcomed by one that hits the surface and kicks off, and wide is called
Sharma to Symonds, no run back of a length, 138.3ks, good carry again as Symonds leaves
Sharma to Symonds, no run good length this time, bringing Symonds' bat down in a hurry as he defends
Sharma to Symonds, no run good length on middle stump, he gets forward and defends
Pathan to Clarke, no run short of a length on middle and off, he gets tall and defends it back
Pathan to Clarke, no run fuller this time, and Clarke reaches out to drive to mid-off
Pathan to Clarke, no run bouncer over the stumps, forcing Clarke to duck low and let it sail over
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run back of a length outside off, 132.7ks, pushed to extra cover for one
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run hits a good length and comes in back, Symonds counters with a push past Pathan's left hand and RP runs across from mid-off to field
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, Clarke gets up and defends to cover
Sharma to Clarke, no run full and moving into leg stump, he shuffles and drives straight to mid-on
Sharma to Clarke, no run full again, with some swing, and Clarke flicks it to midwicket this time

Sharma to Clarke, 1 run straighter one, Clarke nudges wide of midwicket, where Ganguly's slowness of movement allows him a single ... he didn't keep his eyes on the ball and fumbled the collection, the ball slipping out of his fingers
Sharma to Symonds, no run short of a good length and Symonds hops to defend, the thick outside-edge dropping safely in front of second slip
Sharma to Symonds, 2 runs this one's full and encouraging the drive, but Symonds nearly drags onto his stumps with a thick inside-edge to fine leg ... some good running raises the 50
Sharma to Symonds, no run short one slides over leg stump, Symonds ducks and Dhoni collects
Pathan to Clarke, FOUR runs too full on the pads, Clarke clips past Jaffer at midwicket, he runs hard but as he dives to stop his back foot slides over the ropes so Rauf signals four
Pathan to Clarke, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, he gets back and opens the face, steering into the gap wide of a diving gully for more runs
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run good length this time, Clarke strides into the shot and pushes past point
Pathan to Symonds, no run full on middle and leg, Symonds clips nicely and Ganguly times his dive well at mid-on to save runs, that was struck wonderfully

Pathan to Symonds, 2 runs and Tendulkar drops it at first slip! Symonds flashes a cut at one cramping him for room and Tendulkar spills a simple chance in front of his face, reacting late and letting it slip in and out of his palms, as it traveled very hard at him
Pathan to Symonds, no run back of a length outside off, he gets across and leaves it be
Sharma to Clarke, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets across and leaves it be
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run short of a length and angling away, Gilchrist has a look and leaves
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run slides down leg stump, Gilchrist misses the nudge and Dhoni takes
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run fuller length, moving after pitching on off stump, defended to midwicket
Sharma to Gilchrist, 1 run very full, searching for the yorker, Gilchrist uses his feet well and jams it out towards mid-off, immediately calling for the single
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run beaten! Lovely swing, late through the air, and Gilchrist pushes at it
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run back of a length on off stump, Gilchrist gets in line and defends to cover
Pathan to Gilchrist, FOUR runs thats a low full toss as he searches for swing, and duly pushed past cover
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run back of a length, moving in, he checks the line and defends to cover
Pathan to Gilchrist, FOUR runs too straight and he pushes sweetly past mid-on, the ball simply flies away
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run hits a good length and starts to deviate, but Gilchrist is too good, right over it and defending watchfully to cover
Sharma to Symonds, no run short of a length, moving and drawing a thick edge along the ground to gully
Sharma to Symonds, 2 runs too full and straight, moving in, Symonds turns it wide of midwicket
Sharma to Symonds, 4 runs too full again and rightfully clipped past midwicket, Pathan runs hard to stop it just inside the ropes but the batsmen run harder, four in fact
Sharma to Symonds, no run shorter outside off stump, he gets a look-see and leaves it alone
Sharma to Symonds, no run full on off stump, Symonds squirts a drive to Kumble at gully
Sharma to Symonds, no run good length, comes in after pitching as Symonds gets forward and leaves
Singh to Gilchrist, FOUR runs a touch too short and Gilchrist duly swats it away past midwicket for four
Singh to Gilchrist, 1 wide bouncer over middle and leg, Gilchrist thinks about pulling but pulls out as the ball sails high over his right shoulder and a wide is called
Singh to Gilchrist, 1 run banged in short on the stumps, Gilchrist mistimes his hook but the top-edge doesn't carry to Pathan at fine leg, bouncing short ... maybe he should be in closer
Singh to Symonds, 1 run full length, straightening as Symonds plonks forward and gets a touch of bat on it as the ball then rolls into the covers
Singh to Gilchrist, 3 runs good length again, before it can move away Gilchrist eases forward and pushes wide of cover and point, calling for the runs, Ganguly gives chase
Singh to Symonds, no run back of a length on leg stump, hint of swing, Symonds shuffles across and taps it in front of square leg
Singh to Symonds, no run overpitched on leg stump and a decent stop by Jaffer at midwicket saves runs
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run decent shout, as this one nips back in after pitching just outside off stump, catching Gilchrist pretty high above the flap and so that cannot be given out
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run full and wide, Gilchrist crunches a hard slash and thats well stopped at point
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run oh ho ho, now he goes cutting and misses, the ball sneaking just under bat
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run shorter one, nipping back in from off stump and cramping Gilchrist for room a he cuts again, the ball drops onto his pad before rolling away
Sharma to Gilchrist, 1 run pitches outside leg stump, he shuffles and works it to square leg
Sharma to Symonds, 2 runs too full on the pads and he clips it wide of midwicket for a couple
Singh to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off stump, gentle swing, he comes forward and defends
Singh to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller length, coming in and drawing an inside-edge to fine leg as Gilchrist gently pushes at it
Singh to Symonds, no run full and wide, Symonds gets across and thumps a drive to extra cover
Singh to Symonds, no run back of a length, going away, Symonds gets in and shoulders arms

Singh to Symonds, no run thats well bowled, a zooming yorker catching Symonds by surprise, he jams bat down just in time and the ball then spins away - like an offspinner, literally - and narrowly misses hitting leg stump
Singh to Symonds, 1 run short ball on leg, he gets up and plays it to the vacant short leg region
Sharma to Symonds, no run back of a length, curving back in from outside off as Symonds leaves
Sharma to Symonds, no run short of a length, decent channel that, he gets up and leaves it be
Sharma to Symonds, FOUR runs top shot, all power, as Symonds plays a devastating back-foot straight drive to a fullish ball, and the ball scorches to long-off
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run slants down leg stump, Symonds flicks it to midwicket for one
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run angled across at a nice height, squaring him up but since he played with soft hands the outside-edge doesn't carry to Dravid at third slip
Sharma to Gilchrist, FOUR runs just a gently push past mid-off, to a full ball, and thats Gilchrist at his lazy best
Singh to Symonds, FOUR runs full outside leg stump, Symonds plays a leg glance just wide of a diving Dhoni, it was a good effort to get there but the ball evaded him, was a lot of bat on it
Singh to Symonds, no run oh thats close! Symonds is in position to play the cut as the ball was gaining on him and he nearly chops onto his stumps
Singh to Symonds, no run the reply is a bouncer over middle and leg and he ducks low with ease
Singh to Symonds, no run 133.8ks, good ball, swinging in late after pitching full on middle stump, but there's a thick piece of bat on that so nobody appeals
Singh to Symonds, FOUR runs full on off stump as RP again looks for swing, and Symonds walks into a meaty straight drive past the stumps, all touch that shot
Singh to Symonds, 3 runs full ball, Symonds drives to extra cover where Sharma commits a cardinal sin, not getting behind the ball and allowing free runs
Sharma to Symonds, FOUR runs too full again, and he drives handsomely though the covers for four
Sharma to Symonds, FOUR runs short of a length, he gets over it and drops an angled bat on it, Kumble mistimes his dive at gully and so Symonds gets four more with no third man in place
Sharma to Symonds, no run short one over leg stump, Symonds just ducks under it
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run back of a length, coming in from outside off, Gilchrist check the line, making sure to get across to off, and pushes to mid-off
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run sees a short one outside leg stump and goes for a short-arm jab but doesn't time it well at all, the ball bobs up momentarily before falling outside leg
Kumble to Symonds, no run quick and flat on off stump, Symonds gets pack and pushes to cover
Kumble to Symonds, no run flighted up full on off stump, drifts in and he drives hard to cover
Kumble to Symonds, no run that one doesn't spin, as Symonds picks it and plants forward, shouldering arms to it, good carry to Dhoni behind the stumps
Kumble to Symonds, no run fuller on the stumps, he gets forward and defends to midwicket
Kumble to Symonds, FOUR runs a pick-up shot, as he lofts one off the pads over mid-on, scattering seagulls
Kumble to Symonds, SIX runs massive! Symonds shows his form, simply planting the front leg forward and clouting six wide of the sight screen, also raising a rapid half-century, well played
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off stump, Gilchrist gets forward and defends to cover

Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run banged in short outside off stump, Gilchrist plays an impetuous pull shot, mistimed up in the air for an eternity, but Sharma as mid-on reacts very late and runs backwards and cannot get there in time .... India need to take even half-chances
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, he gets up and defends it away
Pathan to Gilchrist, FOUR runs bang, thats four! Gilchrist pulls from outside off stump and sends the ball flying past midwicket with immense timing
Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run short and wide and this time he cuts wide of point for one
Pathan to Symonds, 2 runs likes the width and chops into the gap behind point for another easy two
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flighted up outside off stump, he gets in and drives to cover-point
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run a low full toss on middle and off, he whips it towards midwicket
Kumble to Symonds, 1 run flat, pitching on leg and spinning in, Symonds flicks one to midwicket
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flighted up on a length, he gets back and across and defends
Kumble to Gilchrist, FOUR runs deft touch, as he gets a wink of width and dabs it late, and wide, of slip
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flatter trajectory, short on off stump, he gets up and pushes to point
Pathan to Symonds, no run 123.6ks, full and very wide, he almost has a go but leaves it be
Pathan to Symonds, 1 wide thats a poor delivery, even wide of off stump and called wide, rightfully
Pathan to Symonds, no run again, too full and wide but this time he bludgeons a drive, with too much bottom hand, to Sharma at mid-off
Pathan to Symonds, no run sharp delivery, sitting up off a length and carrying well to Dhoni, after Symonds gets a look in and shoulders arms
Pathan to Symonds, no run good length on middle and off, he plonks forward and pushes to cover
Pathan to Symonds, no run too full and wide, 128.2ks, he sees it pitch and says no thanks
Pathan to Symonds, no run back of a length, angled away, Symonds leaves and thats tea on day two
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flighted up on off stump, Gilchrist gets back and defends
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flighted up on leg stump, he gets back and taps it to leg
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run works this one to midwicket as it spins down leg stump
Kumble to Symonds, no run fizzed up outside off stump, he plants the front leg out and leaves
Kumble to Symonds, no run flighted up on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
Kumble to Symonds, no run a touch fuller outside off stump, Symonds comes forward and defends
Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run a touch full and Gilchrist drives a single down to mid-off, who's deep
Pathan to Symonds, no run 132.3ks, slants away off a short length, Symonds lets it go
Pathan to Symonds, 2 runs comes onto the front foot and drives an easy couple through the covers, some ambling fielding in the deep doesn't do much to raise spirits
Pathan to Symonds, no run short of a length and going across Symonds, who again opts to leave
Pathan to Symonds, FOUR runs thats nothing but a very, very wide full toss which Symonds slaps over gully
Pathan to Symonds, no run full and very wide again, this time he just leaves it alone

Kumble to Gilchrist, no run thats a good shout, as the ball spins in after pitching outside off stump but Gilchrist has a taken a firm stride across ... that hit in line but its a question of height .... a very good appeal
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flatter on on middle and leg, shuffles and works it to midwicket
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run and again, he gets across and defends to the on-side, wide of the fielder
Kumble to Symonds, no run flatter one, middle and leg, he comes forward and defends
Kumble to Symonds, no run comes forward and defends it again, quite watchfully
Kumble to Symonds, 1 run too much room and he gets up to cut wide of point for a single
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run comes forward and steers a wide one through point for one more
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run back of a length outside off stump, he has a look and leaves it alone
Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run short and wide, and slapped away over point for a single
Pathan to Symonds, no run full to be driven and he does so, but the cover fielder dives and intercepts
Pathan to Symonds, no run too full once more and Symonds fails to beat Sharma at mid-off now
Pathan to Symonds, no run similar length, he comes onto the front foot and drives to Ganguly at cover
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flighted up on off stump, he defends back to Kumble
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run flighted down leg stump, he gets down and sweeps to fine leg
Kumble to Symonds, 2 runs now Symonds gets low to delicately paddle one from leg stump into the gap

Kumble to Symonds, OUT wicket No. 600 for Anil Kumble! He fires in a shorter, faster one just outside off stump, Symonds is hurried and cramped into his cut shot, gets a thick outside-edge into Dhoni's gloves, he fails to snap it up but Dravid is sharp at slip, moving to his right and holding the ball after it balloons up in the air, much to In
Kumble to Lee, (no ball) oversteps in excitement, perhaps, and Lee defends it back
Kumble to Lee, no run quicker one, middle and leg, Lee lunges forward to defend
Kumble to Lee, 1 run flatter one, middle and leg, Lee turns it wide and sprints off
Pathan to Lee, no run good length on middle and off, he gets across and defends to midwicket
Pathan to Lee, 1 wide sharp bouncer over off stump, he just gets the head out of the way in time
Pathan to Lee, no run good length there, hurries him into a shot and he gets an inside-edge
Pathan to Lee, no run fuller just outside off stump, Lee comes forward and drives to cover
Pathan to Lee, no run full again, looking for the yorker, and Lee drives it to extra cover
Pathan to Lee, no run shorter one, spitting up and getting Lee hopping, he takes his eyes off it but plays it down safely off the arm guard ... Pathan has a word and smiles at Lee
Pathan to Lee, 3 runs full on middle and leg, Lee clips firmly past Tendulkar at midwicket for three
Kumble to Lee, no run full on middle and off, he lunges forward and defends
Kumble to Lee, no run tossed up on the stumps, he plods forward and defends
Kumble to Lee, no run tossed up again, getting Lee forward and he blocks
Kumble to Lee, no run tossed up on middle and off, defended
Kumble to Lee, 1 run flighted up on middle and leg, he turns it via an inside-edge past Jaffer
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 leg bye spins and bounces and catches him high above the knee roll, leg stump, then rolls wide of slip
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run hits a good length outside off, left alone
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run gets the ball to bend back in to the left hander, Gilchrist gets his bat down and plays it down to the off side
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run adjusts the length to outside the off stump, this one moves away as it leaves the batsman
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run gets this one to land closer to off stump, Gilchrist tightens his defense and plays it back to the bowler
Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller in length and swinging away, Gilchrist pushes to mid-off and sets off quickly, makes it in time
Pathan to Lee, no run aims for that inswinging yorker, gets it to land in line with middle and leg and Lee does well enough to dig it out
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, gets down and sweeps to fine leg
Kumble to Lee, no run full outside off and driven uppishly to the off side
Kumble to Lee, no run gets it to turn outside off, defended to the off side
Kumble to Lee, no run pitches on middle and gets turn again, defended back to the bowler
Kumble to Lee, no run gets turn again and Lee defends back to the bowler on the walk
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off, Gilchrist drives with too much bottom hand, to cover
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run short and wide, should've been slapped away but he finds point instead
Pathan to Gilchrist, no run full outside off stump, he has a mighty drive and inside-edges to Dhoni, but the ball dies well in front of him so alls well
Pathan to Gilchrist, 1 run wide again and Gilchrist connects well, slicing out to deep point for one
Pathan to Lee, 2 runs full on leg stump, Lee clips off the pads out to deep square leg
Pathan to Lee, no run full one, 129ks, on leg stump, worked to Tendulkar at midwicket
Kumble to Gilchrist, no run flatter one, spinning back in from middle stump, watchfully defended
Kumble to Gilchrist, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he uses his feet and drives to extra cover
Kumble to Lee, 2 runs flighted up on a length, Lee comes out and drives in the air wide of cover
Kumble to Lee, no run quicker, 92ks, spins across Lee who hurries to get bat down on it
Kumble to Lee, no run another good leg break, forcing Lee back in his crease and thats defended
Kumble to Lee, (no ball) slower through the air, dipping on leg stump, tucked to short leg
Kumble to Lee, no run quicker and flatter, off stump, Lee defends to Sehwag at gully
Singh to Gilchrist, FOUR runs generous half-volley outside off stump, Gilchrist drives to Sharma at mid-off, who makes another hash of a fielding effort ... real schoolboy lapse that
Singh to Gilchrist, FOUR runs well played, Gilchrist! Thats his fifty, courtesy an aerial smash over mid-off, excellent innings under pressure from the veteran
Singh to Gilchrist, FOUR runs and thats three in a row! Gilchrist gets width and cuts late and hard, into the gap at gully
Singh to Johnson, no run shapes back in off a length as Johnson leaves it be, Dhoni collects
Singh to Johnson, no run beaten, as RP pushes one fuller past Johnson's bat, the ball narrowly missing clipping off stump
Kumble to Lee, no run flighted up on a length, drawing Lee well forward to defend
Kumble to Lee, no run leg break spins across Lee, who covers off stump and leaves
Kumble to Lee, 1 run full, flat down leg, he gets low and semi-pirouettes as he sweeps past Jaffer
Kumble to Johnson, no run flighted outside leg stump, spins away as Johnson gets a firm defence in
Kumble to Johnson, no run full on off stump, driven back to Kumble who fields easily
Kumble to Johnson, no run quicker one bounces into him but he's tall, and plays it down to leg slip
Singh to Lee, no run angles across him off a short length and he's beaten trying to dab it away
Singh to Lee, no run again he gets across and chases it, only to be beaten second time round
Singh to Lee, no run good length and Lee gets low to drive to extra cover off the front foot
Singh to Lee, no run hits a length and reverse-swings back into Lee, who's hurried into defending
Singh to Lee, no run back of a length again, this time straightening, and Lee gets back to defend
Singh to Lee, no run and Lee's beaten again, chasing a wide one with no footwork
Kumble to Johnson, no run flighted up on off stump, Johnson comes forward and defends well
Kumble to Johnson, 1 run full on middle and leg, worked wide of midwicket for a sharp single

Kumble to Lee, no run full and fast, spinning into leg stump sharply, thats the flipper, there's noise and Asad Rauf gets it right, hearing a thick piece of wood on that so he turns down the pleading appeal
Kumble to Lee, no run flighted up outside off stump, he gets forward and defends
Kumble to Lee, no run flighted up outside off stump, he gets forward and defends
Kumble to Lee, 1 run slips down leg stump, Lee swivels on his knees and pulls out to Sharma at deep fine leg, keeping hold of the strike
Singh to Lee, no run yet another swing and a miss, as Lee gets across to off and chases one
Singh to Lee, no run slides down leg stump, he can't connect and Dhoni collects
Singh to Clark, no run beaten outside off stump, he stands and pushes and doesn't connect
Singh to Clark, no run back of a length, Clark gets back and punches to point
Kumble to Johnson, 1 run fast one outside off stump, Tait gets back and across to defend
Kumble to Tait, no run thats a sharp flipper, forcing him back and bat comes down just in time
Kumble to Tait, no run quick again, good length too, he hurries to get forward and defend
Kumble to Tait, FOUR runs thats a good old-fashioned slog, Tait using his feet and driving just wide of mid-on for four, to some cheer as the 200 comes up
Kumble to Tait, no run flipper again, but catching him on the hop outside leg stump
Kumble to Tait, FOUR runs good strike, as Tait slogs Kumble over midwicket to raise his best Test score
Singh to Johnson, no run full and wide, 132.4ks, Johnson drives and connects with hot air
Singh to Johnson, 4 byes slides down leg stump, Dhoni doesn't stop it cleanly and thats down for four
Singh to Johnson, no run back of a length, sliding in from middle stump, worked to midwicket
Singh to Johnson, no run beaten, as this one shapes away from Johnson, who intends on leaving and just manages to pull bat out of the way
Singh to Johnson, FOUR runs nice drive, Johnson drilling a half-volley back past RP's extended fingers
Singh to Johnson, no run pulls that one from outside off stump but cant beat Sehwag at midwicket
Kumble to Tait, no run flipper again, quick too, getting him back to defend to silly point
Kumble to Tait, no run fuller one, middle and leg, he gets forward and defends
Kumble to Tait, no run drifts into leg stump, Tait shuffles and flicks to midwicket
Kumble to Tait, no run full on leg again, this time he goes inside-out hard to extra cover
Kumble to Tait, no run slower one, flighted up on off stump, Tait pushes and inside-edges past leg

Australia are dismissed for 212, which means India lead by 118 runs. There's exactly an hour left today, with 22 overs to be bowled when the innings starts, but it looks like Australia won't get more than 12 in, I feel.

Thirty minutes to go in the session. These two batsmen looking comfortable. Sharma continues.
